185408342.review:
Um dos meus passatempos favoritos da plataforma! Tem aquela cara de jogo das antigas dos meus primeiros pcs. Comprei por um preço bastante acessível nas promoções de férias da plataforma.

No entanto, tive um problema que não sei se é recorrente. Em algum momento, o jogo passou a dar uma mensagem de erro e se recusar a abrir sempre que eu tentava jogar. Tentei desinstalar e instalar de novo, abrir diretamente pelo arquivo baixado e nada. Só se resolveu quando precisei formatar meu notebook e reinstalar tudo do zero, inclusive a Steam. Entrar em contato com a PopCap também não adiantou porque aparentemente o e-mail informado está incorreto.

183604980.review:
Ooh, boy. What do I say about this one? 

It's...a bit much. If you liked Bejeweled 2 or even Bejeweled Classic, you'll probably be pretty disappointed with this game. It drops the spacey sci-fi feel for a more fantastical feel, which I personally dislike--every other match 3 game is fantasy-themed, and the sci-fi part was something I really liked about Bejeweled 2. 

It's also a lot less of a relaxing kind of game--the gamemodes now are a little more app-gamey, and though I like them plenty enough for what they are, I'm just not gripped into them as much as the standard Bejeweled format. The soundtrack also pales in comparison to that of its predecessors and overall I kind of just think I don't like looking at it or listening to it as much as I do Bejeweled 2.

You'll probably just end up playing Poker over and over and that's all you'll need the game for, so if you're looking for a relaxing Match 3 with endless gameplay, this isn't for you.
